https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oXHcj4i5n6l2sXoX92oBKYUVqjl.jpg The owner of a historic inn decides to enter a prestigious cooking contest to win funds for renovations and get free publicity, but she is a horrible cook. She recruits a renowned chef to help but the kitchen isn't the only thing heating up. A Christmas Recipe for Romance
